I could be wrong but I'm g=
uessing like Brian that the question is 
about how long to keep around the =
list of innovations.  I think 
Brian did a good job answering that question=
 and pointing to the 
FAQ.  As far as the question of whether it is only do=
ne in Matlab 
NEAT, assuming I'm understanding the question correctly, I be=
lieve 
the answer is that it is not particular to Matlab NEAT.   However, 
=
like Brian said, it probably won't have a huge impact on performance 
howev=
er long you keep the innovations list.  If anyone has produced 
evidence to=
 the contrary I'd be interested in learning about it.
